description: RAPTOR Plugin Safety Configuration - Default security settings for all plugins

network.comment: Web scanner needs to connect to target URLs - user approval required

exploitGeneration.purpose: educational and authorized security testing only
restrictions: Never execute generated exploits without explicit user approval
Always display exploit code before execution
Only target systems the user owns or has explicit permission to test
Never transmit findings to external services without user approval
Store all output in local out/ directory
Do not persist credentials or API keys in output files
